a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Unemployment rate of men vs. women, 2022
Unemployment refers to the share of the labor force that is without work but available for and seeking
Unemployment, female (% of female labor force) (% of female labor force modeled ILO estimate)
Unemployment, male (% of male labor force) (% of male labor force modeled ILO estimate)
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
